sentences.english: BCN thin films were grown by RF reactive sputtering.
sentences.chinese: 用射频反应溅射法制备出BCN薄膜。

sentences.english: The result of research showed that the a-C:F film was amorphous structure by magnetron sputtering.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果表明，磁控溅射制备的碳氟膜为非晶结构。

sentences.english: A new rotating cylindric magnetron sputtering is presented and successfully pro- duced by ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 提出并研制成功了一种新型旋转圆柱形磁控溅射器。

sentences.english: Reactive magnetic sputtering (RMS) is widely used in optical coating preparation.
sentences.chinese: 反应磁控溅射广泛应用于制备光学薄膜。

sentences.english: The sputtering pressures plays an important role on the microstructure and electrical resistivity of TAZO films.
sentences.chinese: 溅射压强对薄膜的电阻率和微观结构有显著影响。

sentences.english: The glass thin film for optical waveguides is deposited by the magnetron sputtering ?
sentences.chinese: 采用磁控射频溅射法制备光波导用玻璃薄膜。

sentences.english: Tube pitch and losses due to liquid film splatter have a very small influence on evaporative heat exchange characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 管间距及液膜溅射损失对蒸发换热特性影响很小。

sentences.english: It still does splash damage and it has been gifted with the Dark Archon's Feedback ability.
sentences.chinese: 它仍然是溅射伤害，还获得了暗黑执政官得反馈能力。

sentences.english: The power supply will be convenient for controlling the magnetron sputtering coater automatically.
sentences.chinese: 该电源为磁控溅射镀膜设备实现自动控制提供了方便。

sentences.english: The material of the vacuum sputtering layer is lead or lead alloy.
sentences.chinese: 真空溅射层的材质为铅或铅合金。

sentences.english: The sputtering yield per cluster ion is higher than that for monomer ion by a factor of more than 100.
sentences.chinese: 离化团束的溅射产额比之单体离子束高100倍以上。

sentences.english: Growth and characterization of aluminum nitride films by penning-type discharge plasma sputtering process;
sentences.chinese: 根据潘宁放电机理，导出溅射离子泵抽速的理论公式。

sentences.english: The binding force of the film was impacted by sputter technological parameter obscurely .
sentences.chinese: 薄膜结合力受溅射工艺影响并不显著。

sentences.english: Sputtering overall demand tends to reduce demand for capital, too.
sentences.chinese: 溅射总需求也会趋于减少资本需求。

sentences.english: People thought the spluttering sound could help to drive away evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为溅射的声音可以驱赶邪恶的灵魂。

sentences.english: Erratically the flames burst forth, lighting up the sadness in his dark eyes.
sentences.chinese: 突然炉火溅射了出来，照亮了他眼中的悲哀。

definition: (of droplets, sparks etc) to fly about in all directions/to splatter everywhere
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
